ygData.subject: Re: House Ryal - Looking for Members -Rallos Zek-
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I can see an evil guild punishing a deserter .  I can see them making you KOS.  It all fits into role play.  The fact that you are thinking their
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I can see an evil guild punishing a "deserter". I can see them
making you KOS. It all fits into role play. The fact that you are thinking
their behavior to be cruel and harsh makes an elegant point in their favor
as being an evil guild. The fact that they couldn't kill you with X on one
proves the need to leave them FAR behind.

~Xillith

>From: <pwolf@...>

>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] House Ryal - Looking for Members <Rallos
>Zek>

>From: <pwolf@...>

>well....in asking to leave, and them just wanting to kill you for

>another...and it is good you left, for such a guild is not worth being a
>part of.
>
>
>
>
> We help out the new members by helping them level to upper levels as
>soon as possible,,,,i was once in a very bad guild called WOLF CLAN man
>they had to be one of the most unorganized guilds i have ever seen in my
>life....it got very boring for me,,,,,when i asked them that i wanted to
>leave the guild they triied to pk me but we very wrong i managed to take
>out 3 of there warriors in 1 round i just rooted them and let them die.
